channel.title: Dwarf Remains Issues
channel.description:
Yea, im guessing its an anti-dupe or some shit from what i read off rune-server, but I dont bother posting for help there cause people there retarded sometimes.
So my issue is that when I equip something, then remove it, and equip it again, i get dwarf remains in my inventory in it's place. If someone can link me a fix, or post a fix, that would be awesome. I have to fix this asap.
Im not really familiar with the layout of PI because I still do things old school and i just recently moved to 474 (i think). i dont really like the newer graphics and such. bad for PC performance if ur trying to multi-task. So if someone would please help, that'd be awesome. I give u invisible repz.

item.title: Dwarf Remains Issues
item.dc:creator: @imstrength imstrength
item.description:
@imstrength wrote:

kingcobra805:

i’ve honestly never heard of this problem, dwarf remains usually = null if im correct.

yeah same here ive only seen them as nulls

maybe try searching for your wearitem method and poke around there a bit and see where it adds the remains…

Read full topic
